channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Small Truck Companies Also Need Digital Tools
item.description: Small trucking firms often engage in factoring to ensure they have the cash needed to run their business. LoadPay is offering instant factoring paymen...

item.title: Samsung’s Android Update Problem—Reboot All Galaxy Phones Now
item.description: Do not wait until it’s too late — all Samsung users should restart their phones today.

item.title: ‘Avatar: Fire And Ash’ Just Set An Unfortunate Rotten Tomatoes Record
item.description: Avatar: Fire and Ash is set to become a box office phenomenon, but that may be in spite of its lousy reviews.

item.title: Android Circuit: OnePlus 15R Arrives, Pixel 10’s Big Upgrade, The Failure Of Thin Phones

item.title: Bottomless
item.description: Some pits are infinitely deep. Problems that, once addressed, always get worse. N +1. For some folks, the acquisition of money or power are like this....

item.title: Our practice
item.description: What do you do regularly? Where do you show up, what do you publish? Who do you ask, and what do you answer to? What gets better because you persist? ...

item.title: The thing about chess
item.description: In a typical tournament, you don’t score any extra points for winning with the fewest number of moves. Quickly isn’t the point.

item.title: Filtering ourselves
item.description: We don’t use the same language or ideas with an in-law that we do with our bar buddies. When the internet was young, people often chose to filter them...

item.title: Better than the cheap alternative
